oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Goodyear Blimp at the Nashville Airport, 1961 October 10
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A view of the Goodyear Blimp airship at the Nashville Airport, October 10th, 1961. Since 1925, Goodyear blimps have flown the skies as very visible corporate icons, representing one of the largest tire and rubber companies in the world. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Metropolitan Nashville Airport Authority--History--Sources; Goodyear Tire and Rubber Company
